snippet.title: Hadley's Run - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Hadley's Run: A Starship Saga is coming to Steam on the 30th July 2024. New demo coming soon! Wishlist the game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2855990/Hadleys_Run_A_Starship_Saga

Slay your way through a relentless enemy horde in this roguelite twin-stick shooter set in an African future. Unlock epic upgrades, explore alien galaxies, make friends and do battle against a galactic threat. 

Kick ass. Find love. Save the universe.
